manipulations.reflection_shadow_edit: Add a long, distorted shadow of the laptop onto the hardwood floor, extending behind the seated man.
manipulations.replace_background: Replace the background with a bustling cityscape at dusk, visible through a large window.
manipulations.style_material_change: Change the wooden floor to a shiny, polished marble with realistic floor-level reflections.
manipulations.physics_event: Create a slight gust of wind that rustles the edges of the man's shirt and hair, indicating an open window.
manipulations.insert_object: Insert a large, fluffy white cat sleeping peacefully on the table next to the open laptop.
